alert.note: Alert for Alamosa Vicinity, Central San Luis Valley Below 8500 Ft; Del Norte Vicinity, Northern San Luis Valley Below 8500 Ft; Northern Sangre de Cristo Mountains Between 8500 And 11000 Ft; Northern Sangre de Cristo Mountains above 11000 Ft (Colorado) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued July 11 at 3:34PM MDT by NWS Pueblo
info.description: ...Strong thunderstorms will impact portions of northeastern Alamosa, central Custer and southeastern Saguache Counties through 415 PM MDT... At 333 PM MDT, Doppler radar was tracking strong thunderstorms along a line extending from Crestone to near San Luis Lake. Movement was northeast at 5 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 40 mph and pea size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Locations impacted include... Crestone, Hooper, Great Sand Dunes, Mosca and San Luis Lake. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.25 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. Persons in campgrounds should consider seeking sturdy shelter until these storms pass.

area.areaDesc: Alamosa Vicinity, Central San Luis Valley Below 8500 Ft; Del Norte Vicinity, Northern San Luis Valley Below 8500 Ft; Northern Sangre de Cristo Mountains Between 8500 And 11000 Ft; Northern Sangre de Cristo Mountains above 11000 Ft
